name: com.naukri.inspector-maid
author: Naukri
description:
This is a Unity Inspector UI customization feature.
 You can use it to create some simple interactive functionalities for your Component without the need to write a dedicated Editor. It has several key features:

•Uses UIElements for rendering.

•Allows direct access to properties and functions in the Inspector.

•Supports adding multiple widgets to the same target.

•Allows customization of custom widgets.

•Allows dynamic content modification through binding.
